text: We review a trial court's amended order under CR 60 for abuse of discretion. Presidential Ests Apt. Assocs. v. Barrett, 129 Wn.2d 320, 325-26, 917 P.2d 100 (1996). A ruling based on an erroneous view of the law amounts to an abuse of discretion. In re Marriage of Niemi, 19 Wn. App. 2d 357, 362, 496 P.3d 305 (2021).
